Use.Flavor: Spends a Hero Point to use

Table.Name: Hero Actions Deck (do not delete)
Table.MissingWarn: There are no Hero Deck table in this world, whine to your GM about it.
Table.MissingError: Something went wrong when trying to access/create the Hero Deck table.
Table.NoFormula: The Hero Deck table has no formula, tell your GM he messed up.
Table.Replacement: The Hero Deck table has 'Draw with Replacement' enabled, ask your GM to turn it off.

Variant.Name: Hero Actions Variant Rules
Variant.Hint: Support the use of Hero Deck Actions in conjunction with the Hero Points. Changing this setting will reset the unique deck.

DeckId.Name: Hero Deck Table ID
DeckId.Hint: ID of the Unique Deck table, manually change this only if more than one Hero Deck table exists in your world, if no table is found in the world, one will automatically be created.
